channel.title: Ancient European organs
channel.description:
Recordings of noted organs at various locations throughout Europe.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: St. Jacobi
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at St. Jacobi, Hamburg, Germany. Performances include works by Bach.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Church of the Jesuits
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Church of the Jesuits, Soleure, Switzerland. Performances include works by Bach and Couperin.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: German organs
item.description: This program features recordings of the organs at St. Jacobi, Hamburg, Germany and Trinity Organ, Ottobeuren, Germany. Performances include works by Johann Sebastian Bach and Johann Ernst Eberlin.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Church of St. Ignatius
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Church of St. Ignatius, Oratory of the Caravita, Rome, Italy. Performances include works by Frescobaldi.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: San Giuseppe Church
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at San Giuseppe Church, Bresica, Italy. Performances include works by Zipol; Frescobaldi; Pasquini; and Rossi.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Religion

item.title: Pontifical Institute of Music
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Pontifical Institute of Music, Rome, Italy. Performances include works by Francesco Sponga; Andrea Gabrielli; Galuppi; Marulo; and Giovanni Gabriell.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Church Paroissiale de Soiron
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Church Paroissiale de Soiron, Belgium. Performances include works by Kerckhoven; Chaumont; Pachelbel; Buxtehude; and Daquin.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Sweden

item.title: St. Bavon's Cathedral
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at St. Bavon's Cathedral in Ghent, Belgium. Performances include works by Obrecht; Isaac; Cornet; van den Gheyn; and Raick.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Religion

item.title: Church of Haringe
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Church of Haringe, Belgium. Performances include works by Zipoli; Alessandro Scarlatti; Pachelbel; Clerambault; Dandrieu; Fiocco; and Balbastre.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Bahn bei Coburg
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at Bahn bei Coburg, Germany. Performances include works by Johann Lorenz Bach; Johann Sebastian Bach; Walther; Handel; and Schneider.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Belgian organs
item.description: This program features recordings of organs at various locations in Belgium. Performances include works by Daquin; Sweelinck; Telemann; Kreps; Dandrieu; Buxtehude; and Begue.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Santa Maria dei Dereletti Church
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Santa Maria dei Dereletti Church, Venice, Italy. Performances include works by Cavazzoni; Antegnati; and Maschera.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Vaxjo and Malmo organs
item.description: This program features recordings of the Vaxjo Museum organ and the Malmo Museum organ, both located in Sweden. Performances include works by Erbach; Scheidemann; Kaufmann; Hofheimer; Hassler; and Scheidt.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: St. Bavo's Church
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at St. Bavo's Church, Harlem, Holland. Performances include works by Sweelinck.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Abbey of Einsiedeln
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Abbey of Einsiedeln, Switzerland.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Church in Machelen
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the church in Machelen, Deinze, Belgium. Performances include works by Brumel; Scronokx; Cornet; Fiocco; and Grigny.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Eusebius Church
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Eusebius Church, Arnhem, Holland. Performances include works by Scheidemann.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Religion

item.title: Scandinavian churches
item.description: This program features recordings of the organs at the church at Mansala, Finland and at Lofsta Bruk Church, Sweden. Performances include works by Bach; Buxtehude; Zipol, Krebs, and Walter.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Der Aa Church
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Der Aa Church, Groningen, Holland. Performances include works by Scheidemann and Sweelinck.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Adlington Hall
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at Adlington Hall, Oheshire, England. Performances include works by Gibbons; Blow; Stanley; Arne.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Frederiksberg Chapel
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at Frederiksberg Chapel, Hillered, Denmark. Performances include works by Mulliner; Cornet; Macque; and Lorentz.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Bossieres
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the church in Bossieres, Namur, Belgium. Performances include works by Gascongne; Scheidt; Pachelbel; and Chaumont.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Religion

item.title: Trinity organ
item.description: This program features recordings of the Trinity Organ in Ottobeuren, Germany. Performances include works by Couperin; Muffat; and Hugl.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music

item.title: Church of Thorembais-les-Beguines
item.description: This program features recordings of the organ at the Church of Thorembais-les-Beguines, Walloon-Brabant, Belgium. Performances include works by Susato; Cornet; Carissimi-Scheidt; and Buxtehude.
item.dc:creator: Welliver, Harry B., 1910-2005
item.dc:subject: Organ music
